name: SIGMA-MD Whatsapp Bot By Maher Zubair
description: A Whatsapp Bot With Most Premium Features Makes Your Whatsapp Premium. For Any Help See My YT:https://www.youtube.com/@InnoxentTech

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Your Heroku Api Key Here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here

LEVEL_UP_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot send Level up message in chat.

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Fill the value true if you want bot view your Statuses.

MSGS_IN_LOG.description: Fill the value true if you want to see Messages in Console.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot to read all messages.

DISABLE_PM.description: Disable bot in pm, Take it false if you wanna run bot in your pm

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Take it 'true' if you wanna show Always Onlline on whatsapp

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

SESSION_ID.description:
Please put your SESSION_ID here,if you don't have visit to get Session id
https://replit.com/@Mehar-Zubair/SIGMA-MD?v=1

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Please put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

WELCOME_MESSAGE.description: Enter the message here which you want to see when a new user joins a Group.
WELCOME_MESSAGE.value:
@pp
*_Hey Dear_* @user
*_Welcome In_* @gname
*_Read Description CareFully_* @gdesc

*_Support ME By Subscribing_* https://www.youtube.com/@InnoxentTech

MONGODB_URI.description: Add Your Own, If you have key. Its a secret String for Mongodb Connection

WORKTYPE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.

AUTO_REACTION.description:
Set it `true` If You Wants To Reacts emoji to all commands. 
 And Set it `all` is You Wants to React Emojies to All Messages

TIME_ZONE.description: Add Your TimeZone. make sure the timzone is correct/Otherwise you will have errors

GNAME.description: Add Your Group Name Here.You Can See in Most Commands

WAURL.description: Add Your Group Link.You Can See IT IN Most Commands

REMOVE_BG_KEY.description: Add The RemoveBg Api Key.Git New APi Key From remove.bg

THEME.description:
Add The Theme You Like
Available Premium Themes::BTS,SIGMA_MD,JOKER,AVENGERS,SHELBY,PATRICK,MOMOLAND,ANIME
